description:
Trey is 18 years old. He's fresh out of high school, where he cheered on a competitive team. (Translated: gymnast!)

"Do you have a girlfriend back home?"

"Nope," he said. "Keeping it open."

When asked about his sexual preference: "Girls. I prefer girls."

Then he added, almost as an afterthought: "Did a little bi action, but you know..."

"How did that go?"

"Wasn't my thing," he replied. "It was actually my best friend when I was cheering and, I don't know, we kind of just got drunk one night and starting fooling around."

I was confused. He said he done some "bi" action, but hadn't yet mentioned a girl.

"He blew his junk in my mouth!" Trey said. "It happened a couple of times after that with him but that was about it."

Well, I wouldn't call that "bi" action, but fucking hot nonetheless!!

He's young. I don't know about you, but I'd love to see a dick up his ass!

And, of course, since Trey is a gymnast we had to have him do flips across the park in his short shorts with no underwear!
title: Trey
